description_for_human: Plugin for interacting with memory services, providing interfaces for both LongTerm and ShortTerm memory interactions.
description_for_model: This plugin allows you to interact with a memory service. Use the LongTermMemory interface to directly access and manage data in the main database (specifying sections and subsections). Use the ShortTermMemory interface to interact with temporary data storage, which can later be processed and transferred to the LongTermMemory. Ensure to use the correct interface based on the type of memory interaction required.
